cultural-immersion.title: Cultural Immersion
cultural-immersion.intro: Explore the history, rituals, and spiritual significance of the Simhastha Kumbh at Ujjain.

sections.heading: Origins of Simhastha
sections.body: Simhastha is observed when Jupiter enters Leo (Simha). Ujjain's Shipra River becomes the confluence of faith and liberation.

sections.heading: Akhadas & Processions
sections.body: Monastic orders including Juna, Niranjani, and others lead Shahi Snan processions accompanied by chants and music.

sections.heading: Darshan Etiquette
sections.body: Maintain queue discipline, remove footwear near ghats and temples, and follow volunteer guidance.

health-hygiene.title: Health & Hygiene
health-hygiene.intro: Practical tips to stay healthy and safe during the mela.

sections.heading: Hydration
sections.body: Carry a refillable bottle and drink purified water at regular intervals.

sections.heading: Sanitation
sections.body: Use designated toilets and handwashing stations. Keep sanitizer handy.

sections.heading: Medical Help
sections.body: Locate nearest first‑aid kiosks on the map; in emergencies dial local helplines.

eco-awareness.title: Eco‑Awareness
eco-awareness.intro: Adopt green practices to keep the Shipra clean and the mela zero‑waste.

sections.heading: Waste Segregation
sections.body: Use dry/wet bins. Avoid single‑use plastics.

sections.heading: Responsible Bathing
sections.body: Do not use soaps or detergents in the river; follow eco‑guidelines.

sections.heading: Public Transport
sections.body: Prefer shuttles and carpooling to reduce congestion and emissions.

food-water.title: Food & Water
food-water.intro: Find safe food options and water points near you.

sections.heading: Clean Eateries
sections.body: Look for certified stalls with hygiene ratings and visible gloves/caps.

sections.heading: Prasad & Langar
sections.body: Many akhadas offer community meals. Respect serving protocols and waste segregation.

sections.heading: Allergies & Diet
sections.body: Check for nut/dairy indicators; carry necessary medication if required.

transport-routes.title: Transport & Routes
transport-routes.intro: Navigate shuttles, pedestrian corridors, and crowd‑aware routes.

sections.heading: Shuttle Hubs
sections.body: Board from marked hubs to reach Ram Ghat and other key points.

sections.heading: Peak Timings
sections.body: Expect diversions during Shahi Snan. Follow digital signages and volunteers.

sections.heading: Accessibility
sections.body: Dedicated lanes for elderly and differently‑abled at major ghats.

ar-vr-tours.title: AR/VR Tours
ar-vr-tours.intro: Experience immersive narratives of Ujjain’s sacred heritage.

sections.heading: 360° Ghats
sections.body: Virtual walkthroughs of Ram Ghat and nearby temples.

sections.heading: Mythology Capsules
sections.body: Short AR overlays retelling legends of Kumbh and Shipra.

sections.heading: How to Access
sections.body: Use supported smartphones or kiosks; headphones recommended.
